Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 93rd/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Woodlawn, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Woodlawn, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Woodlawn, Stony Island, 95th, over normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Cottage Grove, 95th, over normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Jefferson Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Jefferson Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service from O'Hare to UIC-Halsted, in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
